english.segment1: I come to you, oh god, in the stillness of my heart. I need your healing and your voice in the stillness of my heart
english.segment2: Speak to me and show me who you are. rescue me with your unfailing love and mercy. speak to me and show me who you are. Hold me tightly in your arms and never let me go
english.segment3: I hear you calling out my name in the stillness of my heart. your grace is given me again, now I open my heart
english.segment4: I remember singing praises to your name every day with all my might. How I long to sing to you again.
